welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eldersburg, a charming city known for its beautiful scenery and friendly community. We invite you to explore and discover all the wonderful things our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tipton AAF Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BWI serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at BWI is primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at BWI is primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the airport offers a separate terminal with exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
